title: Elbow Grease Stain Remover Spray | Pre-Wash for Clothes, Carpets & Upholstery - Tackles Grease & Oil Stains | Fresh or Dried-in Stains (500ml)
features: POWER PERFORMANCE: This stain remover spray is tough on dried-in spills, making it ideal for mud stains, ketchup marks or splashes that went unnoticed on laundry day.
WORKS IN MINUTES: Simply spray, leave for 10 minutes, and rinse or wash – it’s that easy. Ideal for busy households where quick turnaround matters and stains can’t be left to linger.
HANDY 500ML BOTTLE: The generous 500ml size offers long-lasting performance for frequent spills and everyday mishaps. Keep one in the laundry, kitchen, or under the sink for convenience.
PRE-WASH LAUNDRY BOOST: Use as a stain remover for clothes to lift grease, oil and food stains before washing. It’s perfect for collars, cuffs, and school shirts after messy meals or play.
UPHOLSTERY-FRIENDLY FORMULA: Refresh soft furnishings with confidence. This cleaner tackles fabric sofa stains, chair cushions, and headboards while remaining fabric-safe and powerful.
MESSY EATER MUST-HAVE: A true messy eater stain treater, this spray is ideal for lifting tomato sauce, chocolate, and curry stains from toddler clothes, bibs and highchair covers.
SAFE ON COLOURED FABRICS: Gentle on colour yet effective on dirt, it’s a reliable solution for stain treating bold prints, uniforms, and everyday garments in your laundry & cleaning routine.
NO HARSH SCRUBBING: Save time and effort – the formula breaks down stains without aggressive rubbing. Great for delicate fabrics or keeping hands clean while dealing with stubborn marks.
IDEAL FOR CARPETS & RUGS: Not just for clothing – use as a carpet stain remover to treat spills on living room rugs, hallway runners or bedroom carpets without leaving harsh residues.
MULTI-SURFACE CLEANING POWER: From clothing to upholstery, this Elbow Grease spray is the ultimate all-rounder. A versatile essential for all-in-one laundry & cleaning support.
description: Product Description Tackle tough stains with ease using Elbow Grease Stain Remover Spray – the go-to solution for messy moments. This powerful 500ml spray is specially designed to remove both fresh and dried-in stains from a range of fabrics and surfaces. Whether it’s greasy food splashes, muddy paw prints or everyday spills, this stain remover for clothes, carpets, and upholstery works fast to break down the mess. Perfect for busy homes, it delivers impressive results on school uniforms, sofa cushions, or the dining room rug. Gentle yet effective, it’s safe on colours and delicate materials, making it ideal for use as a pre-wash booster in laundry routines. Keep it close by in kitchens, utility rooms or even in the car – because life is messy, but cleaning it up doesn’t have to be. Ingredients ETHANOLAMINE, QUATERNARY C12-14 ALKYL METHYL AMINE ETHOXYLATE METHYL CHLORIDE, C9-11 PARETH-8 Contains amongst other ingredients: <5% Non-Ionic Surfactants, Phosphonates, Cationic Surfactants. Also Contains: Perfumes, Limonene, Terpinolene, Citrus Aurantium Peel Oil. Directions Directions for use: Stain Pre-Treatment * Remove any excess soiling / solid residue before use * Applied to the stained fabric on both sides and leave for 10 minutes * Wash as usual with your normal detergent or handwash * Always follow manufacturers instructions for fabric care Carpets / Upholstery * Remove any excess soiling / solid residue before use * Blot away any excess liquid with a clean cloth * Apply to the stain, avoiding over wetting * Leave for 10 minutes * Rinse with clean water and blot dry area with a clean cloth Important: Treat stains immediately and preferably before they dry for best results. Do not use on silk, wool or non-colourfast fabrics. Always test on an inconspicuous area for colour fastness before use. Not suitable for use on waterproof fabrics, velvet, leather or suede. See more
